scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test &&  npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all  && npx sequelize db:migrate  && nyc --require @babel/register  mocha ./api/test/test.js --timeout 20000 --exit
scripts.init-db: cd /usr/local/mysql/bin && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS express_events; CREATE DATABASE express_events CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root && cd -
scripts.init-test-db: cd /usr/local/mysql/bin && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS express_events; CREATE DATABASE express_events CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root && cd -
